name: JPotpourri
short_description: JPotpourri offers some basic java classes to make a programmer's day easier. It includes gui enhancements (widgets, handler) and a lot of easy-to-use utility classes, among them: FileUtil, ZipUtil, DateUtil, CollectionUtil, ...
